activities: We sell valued-added services related to our open source based software products.  In order to provide support services for the software, our customers may need to enter tickets into our system so that we can track the handling of their issues.  At that time, we will ask them for personal information, which may include:  name, company name, title, phone #, physical address, email address and other pertinent information. We also take contact information from visitors to our website who sign up for login-required areas, request trial copies of our software or who ask to be contacted, etc.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data, no manually processed data
